briefTitle: Effectiveness of a Cancer Center Based Physical Activity Intervention
officialTitle: Effectiveness of a Cancer Center Based Physical Activity Intervention
conditions: Breast Cancer, Quality of Life, Physical Activity
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Effectiveness of a cancer center based physical activity intervention for increasing physical activity in breast cancer survivors.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of breast cancer within the last 5 years
* Over the age of 18 years
* female

Exclusion Criteria:

* Non-ambulatory
* Poor cognitive function
* Contraindications for exercise as determined by the PAR-Q
